abilities.name: Rosewood Armor
info: Every 5 seconds, Snow White gains a Thorns Charge. Each Thorns Charge grants Snow White an additional 10% Defense. (Max Stacks: 5)
While Snow White has a Thorns Charge, if she is hit by a Basic Attack or Heavy Attack from a Melee or Tank role, Thorns deals 100% damage to them, and Snow White loses 1 Thorns Charge.
Snow White’s Heavy Attack has a 5% chance to inflict a Wound dealing 10% damage per second for 5 seconds (Max Stacks: 1). Each stack of Thorns increases this chance by 10%.

abilities.name: Thornhammer Surge
info: Deals 400% damage and inflicts the targets with Knock Back.
Snow White Lures all enemies for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Rampant Brambles
info: When Snow White's Thorns deal damage, it has a 100% chance to inflict a Wound dealing 10% damage per second for 5 seconds. (Max Stacks: 3)
Each time Snow White hits an Enemy with a Heavy Attack, she has a 100% chance to gain a Thorns Charge.

talents.name: Friend to the Mighty
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Friend to the Stalwart
talents.info: Grants +20% Defense at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Friend to the Porcupine
talents.info: Snow White's Thorns now deal an additional 100% damage.

talents.name: Friend to the Spider
talents.info: After Snow White hits an Enemy with a Heavy Attack, she has a 70% chance to Root them for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Friend to the Bear
talents.info: Snow White's Heavy Attack deals an additional 100% damage. Heavy Attacks from all allies deal an additional 100% damage to Enemies inflicted with a Root, or when an Ally has a Lure active on them.

talents.name: Friend to the Bees
talents.info: Snow White's Special Ability now deals an additional 50% damage for each Thorns Charge she currently has. Snow White's Special Ability has a 100% chance to grant her a 10% Attack Buff until the end of combat. [Max Stacks: 10]
